list.name: Annotations & Alerts
list.rawQuery:
SELECT
  extract(epoch from time_column) AS time,
  text_column as text,
  tags_column as tags
FROM
  metric_table
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time_column)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  time AS "time",
  id
FROM transfusion_hgb_2021
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  blood_group IN ($query0) AND
  level IN ($query1) AND
  antibody IN ($query2)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  time AS "time",
  fin
FROM transfusion_hgb_2021
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  blood_group IN ($query0) AND
  level IN ($query1) AND
  antibody IN ($query2)
ORDER BY 1

SELECT
  $__timeGroupAlias(time,$query3),
  avg(hours) AS "hours"
FROM transfusion_hgb_2021
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(time) AND
  blood_group IN ($query0) AND
  level IN ($query1) AND
  antibody IN ($query2)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1

ORDER BY 1,2
